Name: may_have_a_minimum_story_points
Description: The User Story must have at least 1 story point.

Name: must_have_a_tested_feature
Description: The feature must have been tested.

Name: may_have_a_minimum_task_effort
Description: The task has a minimum effort of 0.5.

Description: The blocker issue must be resolved.

Description: The stakeholder must have a minimum influence of 1.0.

Description: The task has to be tested.

Name: may_have_a_minimum_stakeholder_feedback

Description: The task needs at least 1 effort.
